title: Spare account?
body: Does anyone have an account they dont want, pref unranked 30 or high level 20's

replies.body: Player accounts are personal to the individual that "creates" them. Any form of account sale/trade/sharing/gifting is a direct violation of the TOU and EULA, and generally results in a perma-ban.
just level 1 up lol doesnt take that long
